Игра топовая, советуй всем. Можно повеселиться с друзьями в закрытой руме. Отмосфера напряжённая, местами страшная
good game

Bueno que decir de este juego, hay muchas opiniones al respecto (tantas de que es bueno como de que es malo). Considero de mi parte que es un buen juego pero aprovechandolo al máximo, es decir, jugar tanto de survi como de killer, porque jugando de killer aprendes de los survis, es decir, a como tratar de ganarles en un loop o sacarles mayor distancia e ir buscando siempre la forma de meter presión y de survi aprendes de los killers, aprendes a ganarles en chase, a aprovechar ciertas estructuras, a sacarle potencial a sus perks, etc. 
Hay que también resaltar que tiende a ser tóxico en cierta forma, pero es como todo en la vida es como vos te lo tomas vos y que perspectiva preferis ver. Tiene sus momentos graciosos, momentos de enojo y momentos de extrema satisfacción. Es un juego con el cual podes pasar el rato con amigos. De killer puede llegar a frustrarte en momentos pero se aprende de ello. 
Hay que entender que jugar SoloQ es un asco, hay momentos en donde existe el compañerismo y en otros en donde te tocan unos conos! Pero en definitiva lo recomiendo. (8)
Es un juego en el cual constantemente se van agregando actualizaciones por ciertos bugfix, cambios, nuevos personajes,etc.
El 19 de Julio de 2022  se vieno un cambio en DbD muy fuerte, un antes y un después en el juego, con nuevos sistemas de prestigio, modificaciones a ciertas meta y no meta perks, entre otras cosas : https://forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/articles/341-developer-update-july-2022
Siento que con este update en el juego, de survi tenes que tryhardear y de killer jugarla de chill. Hay que tener en cuenta ademas que, de killer demora en buscar (porque basicamente estan todos jugando de killer) y de survi demora un poco menos (porque hay muchos killers en cola de juego)

Is it a lot of fun and addicting as a comfort game? Absolutely. Do some of the challenges make me want to rip  my hair out? Totally. Also the fact that every character pack is something you have to pay for with no character rotation isn't a great design choice and the menu and general UI could use some major updates. Games definitely worth it on sale, and a worthwhile investment if you get into it.

Best game

The Balancing is completely gone from this game. Survivors completely dominate the game after rank 10 or so. I guess if you play a survivor only its good but if you main a Killer forget it. Stay away from this game.
I took a long break from playing it, after I've come back its even worse than before.
If you start, then yea the killer has the upper hand but the more you play and the better you become the more you realize that against a good team of survivors you cannot do anything. The game essentially depends on survivors just mocking about, wasting time or making mistakes. If they concentrate on the objective and do not make many mistakes there is nothing a killer can do.
Survivors have insanely strong Perks. Killers got nothing.
Survivors benefit from most of the maps. The Killer does not.
The match making is completely gone nuts. One time you face only new players another time you face the highest rank. Its a complete mess. You enter the game relaxed and come out stressed. Its like work and not a game most matches.

I like this game, its great but i have 2 complaints. 1 the load times arent good, and 2 the other characters are to hard to earn and some you have to buy.  

Edit: Over 200 hours later, i still recommend this game. It is amazing, especially with friends. My past complaint about long load times if false. The load times are pretty good. However I still stand by prices for characters and cosmetics being a bit to expensive. But other than that, it is great!

OK! I think I've enough Play hours in this game to finally put down a review.
I've played Both Sides (killer/survivor) at high level and from I can tell its a Great game given the fact the game style is asymmetric.
This Game is very survivor sided ONLY IF the survivors are plying in a groups and with comms (*note for new players, we call them swf: survivor with friends.)As they can constantly exchange information about the killer's activity and turn the game pretty one sided. But there are some killers in the game that can completely ignore the SWF variable(to a certain degree).
The killer roster is pretty versatile but the option is very limited after you reach high elo, as only fewer killers are viable in high ranks.
THESE ARE THE ONLY VIABLE KILLERS IN HIGH LEVEL AGAINST GOOD SWFS:
SPIRIT, NURSE, PYRAMID HEAD, BLIGHT, HAG, DOCTOR, FREDDY, TWINS(sometimes BUBBA and PIG).
Rest of the roster are pretty useless UNLESS you have like 2k+ hours on killers so that can basically end every chase within 15-20 seconds and slug when needed.
(*NOTE: even the top killers i mentioned takes a lot of time to learn. ESPECIALLY NURSE,
EVEN SPIRIT IS NO JOKE TO LEARN, A lot of game senses and predictions are required to play Spirit Efficiently as well)

*I Don't like how every time the DEVs buffs a killer, they also Nerfs the killer in some other way as well.
*There are a lots of Perks in the game that are basically useless and a little buff could change them into playable perks.
*Hit-boxes are terrible in this game when I play NURSE/HUNTRESS.

The community is mostly toxic and unwelcoming towards new players, especially new killers.
My first trapper game I got bullied with ds's, Head on & flashlights  unnecessarily, and endless t-bags at the exit gates(having no clue half the game what's going on), and on top of that abusive texts and endless insults in post game chat. This is very discouraging towards new players. If this goes on people will stop playing killer and abuse the very killer when they play survivor next time. this not only creates a bad cycle but also heavily impacts the match making as fewer people are interested in playing the killer.

Still there are many nice people in this  community that appreciate the other sides when they play and i hope more people could have that mindset to make the community better.

А так, в общем и целом, игра очень хороша, жаль только, что онлайн просел(((

Jedna z niewielu gier, w którą chętnie się gra nawet przez kilka lat. :P
Aktualny czas gry: 298,8 godzin
pretty good job so far

-3 huevos

-1 yogur de limón

-aceite de oliva (1 medida del yogur)

-azúcar (2 medidas de yogur)

-harina (3 medidas de yogur)

-1 sobre de levadura .

-1 limón

-1 cucharada de azúcar ,

harina y mantequilla para untar

Elaboración de la receta de Bizcocho de limón:
Calienta el horno.

Bate los huevos. Agrega el azúcar, el yogur, el aceite y la ralladura de limón. Mezcla la harina y la levadura y añade. Sigue batiendo hasta que todos los ingredientes queden perfectamente incorporados.

Unta un molde con mantequilla o aceite y espolvorea con harina, vierte la mezcla y hornéalo a 180ºC durante 40-45 minutos. 

Deja que se temple y desmóldalo. Sirve el bizcocho de limón, espolvoréalo con un poco de azúcar glaseada y adorna el plato con un poco de mermelada y unas hojas de menta.
